# focusStyle

**Instance Property**

The appearance of the cell when focused.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var focusStyle: UITableViewCell.FocusStyle { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value of this property is [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITableViewCell/FocusStyle-swift.enum/default]. For the list of possible focus styles, see [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITableViewCell/FocusStyle-swift.enum].

## Managing focus

- **UITableViewCell.FocusStyle**: The style of focused cells.
